title: Unspecified Error On 7.2 patch Load
body: I had to patch my league client with the 7.2 , and at the 33% of charging , At Calculating Diferencess , Files Scanned when it goes to 100 , the error comes down Sayng , "Unspecified Error , Please Check The logs for more informations , I retry 1 houndred times , and its reseting from 1 file scanned i even deleted The lol_air_client from project folder to reset the whole patcher but still doesn't work  , and it goes to 50 or 100 and the Error occurs  again, i've tried with the hextech repair toll too , with the repatch option tick but not working either  Seems like you messed up something again , as the fullscreen issue didn't goes off as well , i  let you know .

replies.body:
It happens the same with me. Using the beta client it does not go any higher, (It runs numbers next to all items name in game, and it stops there. It proceeds to pop up a box saying there is a patching error. to restart the client [which I  have done 1 mill times already[[ .. I switch to the original game client and it happens just as the main dude from thread say's , it stops at 33% and the unespecified error pop up  happens. 

I can't set up a game because of it obviously :(

At 33%, your files are done prepping for the update and starts connecting to the patching server.  It sounds like your network is failing to connect to the patching servers.  Run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get that fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Thank you, that was the problem ! :)

There currently aren't any issues with the patching servers that I was able to find.  If this is happening at or above 33% then something with your network might have changed, and is blocking access to our patching servers.  You'll want to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to configure your network and restore that access.  I hope that helps!
I have had the same problem, and have been through the connection issues guide, and am still having the same issue as the original poster.

I forget to mention , after i opened the client i switched my cable from the router on an another link , cuz i had big ms in the past , and i switched it in the time when patch was on , and then i recivied that error after i disconected the cable and inserted again , and i rlly cant find a solution again , i tried with the hextech repair tool , ur Connection issue link its not helping bcuz there's a lot of problems wich i cannot recognize wich one its mine , i even reisntalled League of legends Twice and no Result .
I've had the same problem for the last 2 years, have searched for so much help , no friend's or anyone online can figure it out. this is pretty pathetic. RIOT find out what the problem is.
same problem, I delete the game and re download, still said unspecific error occurred, when I use adim launcher, it will stop at 1files scan 33%.
If you have this problem try removing AVG or your anti virus. I had this problem for so long and nothing riot showed me worked. But when i Removed my AVG my league worked again. Hope this Helps
I'm having the same issue and can't seem to fix it.

If this is happening at or above 33% then your connection might be failing to reach the patching server.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help fix it up.  Let me know if you run into any issues.

Same here I've tried restarting my computer like 10 times tried the repair a few times and uninstalled it a few times as well but still getting an unspecified error and i even have multiple other computers in the house im in with their computers working just fine with the new update
Same problem here. My net is fine. Restarted PC and the same problem happened again. Tried several times.
